title: Now That I’m Back, I’ll Get My Revenge - Novel Updates
tags: Abusive Characters   Age Regression   European Ambience   Fantasy World   Female Protagonist   Nobles   R-18   Revenge   R*pe   Second Chance   S*xual Abuse   Suicides   Tragic Past
author: 권이은
description:
I wanted to die so badly, but then I regressed.

As soon as I regressed, I wanted to die again, but a man tried his best to stop me.

It pissed me off, but I have a lot of power.

Now I'm going to take my revenge on the people who tormented me.

My husband, who never shied away from violence; my lover, who seduced me with flattery and then abandoned me; the mercenary, who made me his servant.

I'll go get revenge.>
